title: Leadership
intro: ValorForge Solutions is led by a team of seasoned executives with deep expertise in telecommunications, cybersecurity, IT modernization, and strategic consulting. Our leaders bring decades of federal and commercial sector experience, combining military discipline with Big Four rigor.

leaders.name: Darryl Wilkerson
leaders.title: Strategic Operations & Cybersecurity Infrastructure Leader
leaders.paragraph1: Darryl Wilkerson is an executive leader with over 40 years of experience managing global telecommunications, network security, and the federal consulting marketplace. A retired Senior Officer in the United States Navy, Darryl's professional foundation was built on high-level military leadership and mission-critical operations. He has led high-stakes P&L management and strategic business turnarounds within the GovCon sector, with deep expertise in large-scale system integration and secure communications.
leaders.paragraph2: His career includes complex technical portfolios at L-3 Communications and Teledyne Brown Engineering, bringing a disciplined approach to solving connectivity and data protection challenges. With advanced degrees in business and organizational management, Darryl champions a culture of innovation prioritizing transparency, integrity, and proactive risk management. His mastery of Security-by-Design ensures federal agencies and enterprise partners navigate the digital landscape with operational clarity and resilience.

leaders.name: Erian Laperi
leaders.title: CTO â€“ Communications, Media & Technology
leaders.paragraph1: Erian Laperi is a technology executive with over 20 years of experience driving innovation across global telecommunications and technology landscapes. As CTO for Cognizant's CMT practice, Erian leads large-scale strategic initiatives modernizing legacy systems and redefining industry standards. His career includes spearheading high-impact programs leveraging GenAI and automation to simplify complex global infrastructures.
leaders.paragraph2: With a technical foundation forged during 13 years at AT&T, Erian pioneered integrating Big Data, Machine Learning, and Digital Twin platforms for decision-making. He led the Network GenAI program and co-founded the internal startup that became the Chief Data Office, establishing rigorous data privacy, governance, and protection standards. His expertise spans architecting AI-driven automation that doubled operational savings to overseeing complex M&A integrations. Erian believes true innovation is rooted in customer-first culture and continuous empowerment of people.

leaders.name: Tim LaFaver
leaders.title: Head of Strategy & Innovation
leaders.paragraph1: Tim LaFaver is an executive and strategist with three decades of experience at the intersection of Information Technology and large-scale operational transformation. Currently Head of Strategy for the Communications Sector Americas at Cognizant, Tim excels at translating complex technological frameworks into actionable intelligence for policy and decision-makers. His career is defined by bridging high-level strategic requirements and ground-level systems thinking to achieve maximum mission results.
leaders.paragraph2: As a founding CIO/CISO and Chief Innovation Officer within the public sector, Tim brings expertise in IT governance, cybersecurity, and infrastructure modernization. He is a Fellow of the Information Systems Security Association (ISSA) with a proven track record building secure technology environments ensuring transparency, accountability, and regulatory compliance. His telecommunications industry experience enables him to drive innovation across 5G, IoT, and cloud-native ecosystems while maintaining rigorous focus on cost reduction and process optimization. Tim's leadership philosophy prioritizes people-first approaches and technology as a tool for equity and lasting value.

seoDescription: Meet the executive leadership team at ValorForge Solutions. Veteran-led expertise in cybersecurity, AI modernization, telecommunications, and strategic IT consulting.
